name: circular-library
description: The Circular Layer 1 Blockchain Protocol Interface Library is a JavaScript library designed to integrate seamlessly with Circular's blockchain platforms. This open-source library, maintained by Circular Global Ledgers, Inc., provides a comprehensive suite of tools for interacting with blockchain networks, managing wallets, assets, smart contracts, and more.
author: Gianluca De Novi
license: Open Source for private and commercial use
